description.en: In one unusual Tokyo high school, education takes a backseat to brawling as warring clubs wreak havoc in the hallways and chaos in the classrooms, all vying to be the baddest team around! Although they often contribute their fair share, only a handful of students serve to stem the tide of violence in this untamed outpost. These are the few, the proud, the powerful: the members of the Juken Club!

biography.en:
Alternative Names: G3, Oh Great!, Oh Great!!, Oh!Great, OOGURE Ito, Огурэ Ито, おおぐれいと, 大暮维人
Birth Place: Hyuga, Miyazaki, Japan
Birth Date: February 22, 1972 
Zodiac: Pisces
Blood Type: AB

His pseudonym "Oh! great" is a play on words. His real name, written in the Japanese order with the family name before the given name, is OOGURE Ito, which is pronounced similarly to the Japanese rendering of the English words "Oh great," Oogureeto [oːɡuɽeːto], with the only difference being the extended E. Furthermore, "oh" can mean king in Japanese, making it possible to read the name as "the great king".

Characteristics of Ito's style include violent plots, the use of English words amidst kanji, and a parade of beautiful female characters.

In 2006, he received the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen for Air Gear. Ito also created the adult series Silky Whip (Official English Title). He also designed some of the alternate character outfits in the PlayStation 2 version of Namco's 3D fighting game Tekken 5, as well as a guest character in Soul Calibur IV named Ashlotte.

Once applied as  assistant for [Morita Masanori](https://mangadex.org/author/d21d9b2b-27b4-44bc-9a6d-493bf98ed42c/morita-masanori) when he was a freeter, but didn’t get the job.

[Noguchi Koyuri](https://mangadex.org/author/5c84bfbc-e2e6-406b-aafa-2d8cf96e15c2/noguchi-koyuri) was his assistant in Air Gear while Yashirogawa Takashi was on Tenjou Tenge.

Circle(s): G3.
